check_box.label: Override VRAM detection
check_box.name: FSOverrideVRAMDetection
check_box.tool_tip: Enable the user to override VRAM detection (use with extreme caution)

slider.label: Override GPU Dedicated VRAM (GB):
slider.name: FSForcedVideoMemory
slider.tool_tip: Important: Use with extreme caution. Override the detected VRAM on your GPU. This must not include 'shared' VRAM which is part of the system RAM. If you do not understand the distinction then leave this control alone.

check_box.label: Enable Lossy Texture Compression
check_box.name: texture compression
check_box.tool_tip: Compresses textures in video memory, allowing for higher resolution textures and/or more textures to be loaded at the cost of some color quality.

slider.label: Scale of Terrain Texture Rendering
slider.name: RenderTerrainScale
slider.tool_tip: Determines scale of terrain textures - lower is more compressed (requires viewer restart)
